lom:description.lom:string:
This is a course offered in Women's Studies Program at The University of Texas at Arlington College of Education. The course "Explores the role of women in science. Emphasis on gender and science, the history of women in science, gender equity in the classroom, strategies for the retention of women scientists, the current culture/climate for women in science, and contemporary women in science. This class will challenge students to think critically about the role of women in science throughout history and up to the present day. The course supports diversity in the sciences and the retention of females in the science pipeline."
Keywords: Gender Equity
